cause.description:
What good is knowing everything in this world if I can't answer simple questions like "who am I?", "where did I come from?", "where will I go?", "why am I here?".
Sometimes I know I don't know, and sometimes I don't know I know. BOING!
1. A mind free of prejudice is key to true understanding.
2. Religions are like different fingers trying to point us to the Moon. How do we see the Moon when we are transfixed by the finger?
3. The turbulent state of the Earth today reflects our collective inner states. Start with the inner and the outer will follow.
cause.name: Man, know thyself.
